name: The Jump Story
description:
This is a PROTOTYPE of hardcore vertical puzzle platformer.

Inspired by 'Jump King' and 'Getting over it...' but for a mobile.  So, it's all about jumping up and falling down. With planned mystery story of ascending frog.

I started this game as a personal project back in 2021, but currently unable to continue, as war happen in Ukraine. Feedback is welcome, as i plan to continue development at some point.

This game designed as a portrait mobile. Get apk on android. Web version is the same, but font rendering is worse.

Numbers next to a level name are: number of your jumps / minimal possible jumps (less is better. for physics levels it's unknown)
